summary: Test suite for the Stable Diffusion 2 inpainting pipeline, containing fast unit tests with lightweight mock components to verify batch handling and output correctness, as well as integration tests that exercise the full pipeline under various precision and device offloading settings.
business_intent: Validate the reliability and correctness of the Stable Diffusion 2 image inpainting functionality across different execution modes, ensuring confidence for developers and downstream applications before release.
